DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct 2 part . Phase I involve dose escalation subcutaneous CAMPATH ( SQ ) give 3 time per week combination weekly dos rituximab ( 375mg/m2 ) maximum 8 week order determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) . In Phase II patient treat SQ CAMPATH MTD plus weekly rituximab ( 375mg/m2 ) maximum 8 week primary objective define Overall Response ( OR ) combination .
